tosdr.tldr:
"If we wish to pass your sensitive personal data onto a third party we will only do so once we have obtained your consent, or if it is necessary to comply with an employment contract, or we are legally required to do so." 

Conditions of sharing your personal information without your consent are employment contract compliance and legal obligation, both of which are not defined.
tosdr.case: This service can share your personal information to third parties

title: This service can share your personal information to third parties
quoteText: If we wish to pass your sensitive personal data onto a third party we will only do so once we have obtained your consent, or if it is necessary to comply with an employment contract, or we are legally required to do so.
